name: hanoi
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of Vietnam, in the northern part of the country: The governments hoped to attract international investment for urban development projects in Hanoi. The children attended an international school in Hanoi.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Hanoi the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Hanoi.An amateur cameramen has filmed rare giant turtles in a lake in Hanoi.Our hotel was in the Old Quarter of Hanoi, which is full of narrow streets.The president announced that Hanoi and Washington had agreed to face-to-face negotiations.
